message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.SI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with error/erasure decoding of binary codes, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of soft information and the determination of the optimal erasing strategy also involve statistical inference (cs.ST) and machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves the analysis of the minimum Hamming distance of the code, which is a topic related to discrete mathematics (cs.DS).
